title: Create a Basic Promise
description: Learn how to create and use a simple Promise
instructions:
Write a function `delayedMessage(message, delay)` that returns a Promise. The promise should resolve with the given message after the specified delay (in milliseconds).

Example: delayedMessage('Hello', 1000) should resolve with 'Hello' after 1 second

hints.content: A Promise is created with `new Promise((resolve, reject) => { ... })`. Use setTimeout to delay the resolution.
Inside the Promise constructor, use setTimeout with the delay parameter. Call resolve(message) when the timeout completes.
Use: `return new Promise((resolve) => { setTimeout(() => { resolve(message); }, delay); });`
